Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class EntityRenderersEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.EntityRenderersEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModBusEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntityRenderersEvent.AddLayers, EntityRenderersEvent.CreateSkullModels, EntityRenderersEvent.RegisterLayerDefinitions, EntityRenderersEvent.RegisterRenderers
public abstract class EntityRenderersEvent extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event implements IModBusEvent
Fired for on different events/actions relating to entity renderers. See the various subclasses for listening to different events.

These events are fired on the mod-specific event bus, only on the logical client.

See Also:
  • EntityRenderersEvent.RegisterLayerDefinitions
  • EntityRenderersEvent.RegisterRenderers
  • EntityRenderersEvent.AddLayers
